resources.string: App is providing live, historical and forecast data about pollution and weather based on user\'s location. Data comes from external providers, developer is not responsible for any incorrect data. Created by Krzysztof Kobiałka in Kraków, Poland. Open-source and free to use under the MIT license.

All the data comes from www.aqicn.org. The World Air Quality Index project is a non-profit project started in 2007. Its mission is to promote air pollution awareness for citizens and provide a unified and world-wide air quality information. The project is providing transparent air quality information for more than 130 countries, covering more than 30,000 stations in 2000 major cities, via those two websites: aqicn.org and waqi.info.
